text: The search functionality for the 1.3 docs shoots you over to search.apache.org. And from there I'm getting the content that is on people.apache.org.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
sander@temme.net
text: Fixed in r939544, and already published on the site.  I copied over the Google form language from the 2.2 docs, changing '2.2' to '1.3' in the extra query string parameter.  The one I may have miffed is the Japanese translation, since I can't spell 'Version' in Japanese and the copy-paste from the (UTF-8) 2.2 doc to the (iso-2022-jp) 1.3 doc was broken.
